member.name: T:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings
member.summary: Settings that impact the runtime behavior of the .

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.AppName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the app.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.ControlQueueBatchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of messages to pull from the control queue at a time. The default is 32. The maximum batch size supported by Azure Storage Queues is 32.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.ControlQueueBufferThreshold
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of control queue messages that can be buffered in memory at a time, at which point the dispatcher will wait before dequeuing any additional messages. The default is 64.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.ControlQueueVisibilityTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility timeout of dequeued control queue messages. The default is 5 minutes.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.ControlQueueRequestOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the that are provided to all internal usage of APIs for the control queue.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.WorkItemQueueVisibilityTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the visibility timeout of dequeued work item queue messages. The default is 5 minutes.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.WorkItemQueueRequestOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the that are provided to all internal usage of APIs for the work item queue.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.HistoryTableRequestOptions
member.summary: Gets or sets the that are provided to all internal usage of the APIs for the history table.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.StorageConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure Storage connection string.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.TrackingStoreNamePrefix
member.summary: Gets or sets the prefix of the TrackingStore table name. This property is only used when we have TrackingStoreStorageAccountDetails. The default is "DurableTask"

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.TaskHubName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the task hub. This value is used to group related storage resources.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.MaxConcurrentTaskActivityWorkItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of work items that can be processed concurrently on a single node. The default value is 10.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.MaxConcurrentTaskOrchestrationWorkItems
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of orchestrations that can be processed concurrently on a single node. The default value is 100.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.MaxStorageOperationConcurrency
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent storage operations that can be executed in the context of a single orchestration instance.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.MaxCheckpointBatchSize
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of orchestrator actions to checkpoint at a time.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.WorkerId
member.summary: Gets or sets the identifier for the current worker.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.PartitionCount
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of orchestration partitions.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.ExtendedSessionsEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether to enable extended sessions.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.FetchLargeMessageDataEnabled
member.summary: Gets or sets a flag indicating whether to automatically fetch large orchestration input and outputs when it is stored in a compressed blob when retrieving orchestration state.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.ExtendedSessionIdleTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds before an idle session times out.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.LeaseRenewInterval
member.summary: Renew interval for all leases for partitions currently held.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.LeaseAcquireInterval
member.summary: Interval when the current worker instance kicks off a task to compute if partitions are distributed evenly. among known host instances.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.LeaseInterval
member.summary: Interval for which the lease is taken on Azure Blob representing a task hub partition. If the lease is not renewed within this interval, it will cause it to expire and ownership of the partition will move to another worker instance.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.MaxQueuePollingInterval
member.summary: Maximum interval for polling control and work-item queues.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.UseAppLease
member.summary: If true, takes a lease on the task hub container, allowing for only one app to process messages in a task hub at a time.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.AppLeaseOptions
member.summary: If UseAppLease is true, gets or sets the AppLeaaseOptions used for acquiring the lease to start the application.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.StorageAccountDetails
member.summary: Gets or sets the Azure Storage Account details If provided, this is used to connect to Azure Storage

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.TrackingStoreStorageAccountDetails
member.summary: Gets or sets the Storage Account Details for Tracking Store. In case of null, StorageAccountDetails is applied.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.EventBehaviourForContinueAsNew
member.summary: Should we carry over unexecuted raised events to the next iteration of an orchestration on ContinueAsNew

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.ThrowExceptionOnInvalidDedupeStatus
member.summary: When true, will throw an exception when attempting to create an orchestration with an existing dedupe status.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.UseLegacyPartitionManagement
member.summary: Use the legacy partition management strategy, which improves performance at the cost of being less resiliant to split brain.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.UseDataContractSerialization
member.summary: User serialization that will respect . Default is false.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.LoggerFactory
member.summary: Gets or sets the optional to use for diagnostic logging.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.DisableExecutionStartedDeduplication
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to disable the ExecutionStarted de-duplication logic.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.OnImminentFailFast
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional function to be executed before the app is recycled. Reason for shutdown is passed as a string parameter. This can be used to perform any pending cleanup tasks or just do a graceful shutdown. The function returns a . If 'true' is returned is executed, if 'false' is returned, process kill is skipped. A wait time of 35 seconds will be given for the task to finish, if the task does not finish in required time, will be executed.
member.remarks: Skipping process kill by returning false might have negative consequences if since Storage SDK might be in deadlock. Ensure if you return false a process shutdown is executed by you.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.MaxNumberOfTimeoutsBeforeRecycle
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of times we allow the timeout to be hit before recycling the app. We set this to a fixed value to prevent building up an infinite number of deadlocked tasks and leak resources.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.StorageRequestsTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the number of seconds before a request to Azure Storage is considered as timed out.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.StorageRequestsTimeoutCooldown
member.summary: Gets or sets the window duration (in seconds) in which we count the number of timed out request before recycling the app.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.HasTrackingStoreStorageAccount
member.summary: Returns bool indicating is the TrackingStoreStorageAccount has been set.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.AzureStorageOrchestrationServiceSettings.Logger
member.summary: Gets an instance of that can be used for writing structured logs.

member.name: T:DurableTask.AzureStorage.BackoffPollingHelper
member.summary: Utility for implementing semi-intelligent backoff polling for Azure queues.

member.name: T:DurableTask.AzureStorage.DataContractJsonConverter
member.summary: This class bridges with Newtonsoft.Json. This serializer is slower, but it handles writing to , which Newtonsoft does not. A drawback of is that ExtensionData Namespaces are not populated, meaning reading via the regular will not correctly hydrate extra fields from ExtensionData. However, it can still be done by using instead.

member.summary: DurableStatusQueryResult is a result object for OrchestrationInstanceStatusQuery

member.summary: ContinuationToken

member.name: T:DurableTask.AzureStorage.Fnv1aHashHelper
member.summary: Fast, non-cryptographic hash function helper.
member.remarks: See https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fowler%E2%80%93Noll%E2%80%93Vo_hash_function. Tested with production data and random guids. The result was good distribution.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.Monitoring.DisconnectedPerformanceMonitor.EnableRandomScaleDownOnLowLatency
member.summary: Gets or sets a value to enable random scale-in (e.g. 10% of recommendations) when queue latencies are low. This property should be set to false for unit testing.

member.summary: Collects and returns a sampling of all performance metrics being observed by this instance as well as a scale recommendation.
member.param: The number of workers known to be processing messages for this task hub.
member.returns: Returns a performance data summary with scale recommendation or null if data cannot be obtained.

member.name: M:DurableTask.AzureStorage.Monitoring.DisconnectedPerformanceMonitor.PulseAsync
member.summary: Collects and returns a sampling of all performance metrics being observed by this instance. Will not return a scale recommendation.
member.returns: Returns a performance data summary with no scale recommendation or null if data cannot be obtained.

member.name: T:DurableTask.AzureStorage.OrchestrationInstanceStatus
member.summary: Table Entity Representation of an Orchestration Instance's Status

member.name: M:DurableTask.AzureStorage.OrchestrationSessionManager.DedupeExecutionStartedMessagesAsync(DurableTask.AzureStorage.Messaging.ControlQueue,System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList{DurableTask.AzureStorage.MessageData},System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: This method enumerates all the provided queue messages looking for ExecutionStarted messages. If any are found, it queries table storage to ensure that each message has a matching record in the Instances table. If not, this method will either asynchronously discard the message or abandon it for reprocessing in case the Instances table record hasn't been written yet (this happens asynchronously and there is no guaranteed order). Meanwhile, this method will return the list of filtered messages.
member.param: A reference to the control queue from which these messages were dequeued.
The full set of messages recently dequeued.
The trace activity ID to use when writing traces.
member.returns: Returns the list of non-ExecutionStarted messages. This may be an empty list.

member.name: M:DurableTask.AzureStorage.OrchestrationSessionManager.IsScheduledAfterInstanceUpdate(DurableTask.AzureStorage.MessageData,DurableTask.Core.OrchestrationState)
member.summary: Returns true if was scheduled (or rescheduled) after the corresponding record was written to the Instances table; false otherwise. This logic is used to help determine whether an ExecutionStarted message is redundant and can be de-duped.

member.name: M:DurableTask.AzureStorage.OrchestrationSessionManager.AddMessageToPendingOrchestration(DurableTask.AzureStorage.Messaging.ControlQueue,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{DurableTask.AzureStorage.MessageData},System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary:
Adds history messages to an orchestration for its next replay.
"Pending" here is unrelated to the Pending runtimeStatus.
member.param: New messages to assign to orchestrators
Cancellation token in case the orchestration is terminated.

member.name: T:DurableTask.AzureStorage.Partitioning.AppLeaseManager
member.summary: Class responsible for starting and stopping the partition manager. Also implements the app lease feature to ensure a single app's partition manager is started at a time.

member.name: T:DurableTask.AzureStorage.Partitioning.AppLeaseOptions
member.summary: Options to control timing intervals for the app lease.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.Partitioning.AppLeaseOptions.RenewInterval
member.summary: Renew interval for the app lease held by this instance.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.Partitioning.AppLeaseOptions.AcquireInterval
member.summary: Interval when this instance attempts to continuously acquire the app lease. When two applications are running, this setting will affect the secondary app attempting to take the app lease from the first app.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.Partitioning.AppLeaseOptions.LeaseInterval
member.summary: Interval for which the lease is taken on Azure Blob representing an EventHub partition. If the lease is not renewed within this interval, it will cause it to expire and ownership of the app lease will move to another instance.

member.name: P:DurableTask.AzureStorage.Partitioning.AppLeaseOptions.DefaultOptions
member.summary: Creates an instance of with following default values: a) RenewInterval = 25 seconds b) AcquireInterval = 300 seconds, or 5 minutes c) DefaultLeaseInterval = 60 seconds

member.summary: Gets or sets the lease token that manages concurrency between hosts. You can use this token to guarantee single access to any resource needed by the object.

member.summary: Gets or sets the epoch year of the lease, which is a value you can use to determine the most recent owner of a partition between competing nodes.

member.summary: Renew interval for all leases for partitions currently held by this instance.

member.summary: Interval when this instance kicks off a task to compute if partitions are distributed evenly among known host instances.

member.summary: Interval for which the lease is taken on Azure Blob representing an EventHub partition. If the lease is not renewed within this interval, it will cause it to expire and ownership of the partition will move to another instance.

member.summary: Determines whether or not this set of leases should utilize lease stealing logic for rebalancing during scale-out operations.
